text: 5:20: Chvr 10:12; 1 Pet 4:8 mahi riettit roi: tukhom mi nunsie a lampui dikloi renga amapa hah aninônchu amanu hah a hong mehei nôkpu han ma mi nunsie ratha5:20: mi nunsie ratha hah; aninônchu ama ratha ngêt. hah thina renga sanminring a ta, sietna tamtak chungroia ngâidamna mintung atih.
